Imam Osman Reza was an accomplished janni alim in Zakhara in 1367 DR.
Osman was an esteemed teacher at the magical University of QadibThe source text states the "University of Qadim", but this is believed to be a typo instead of saying the "University of Qadib" because Qadib was renowned for its universities.. He was renowned for his honest and balanced interpretation of the Law of the Loregiver.
